alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 5:56PM EDT until August 29 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR MONROE AND EASTERN LENAWEE COUNTIES... At 556 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Milan to near Deerfield to 9 miles southwest of Blissfield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Milan, Petersburg and Deerfield around 600 PM EDT. Dundee around 605 PM EDT. Ida and Ottawa Lake around 610 PM EDT. Maybee around 615 PM EDT. Monroe, Carleton, Temperance and Lambertville around 620 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 625 PM EDT. Luna Pier around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Newport, Ogden Center, Erie, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Bolles Harbor, Sand Creek and Samaria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
